title: Maximizing the Effectiveness of Science Education Through Digital Exhibition Utilization in Self-Directed Museum Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool utilization skills and foundational knowledge in secondary-level science
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for in-service secondary science teachers to apply museum digital exhibition technologies in classroom instruction

learning_goals: Learners can visualize scientific concepts in three or more ways using digital interactive tools.
Learners can create one or more customized microlearning contents based on the principles of museum digital exhibition design.
Learners can analyze the effect of improved learner engagement through digital exhibition evaluation using quantitative metrics.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
